name: Ellis
dialogue: [quiet]Ellis sits and bashfully smiles at you.
Hello! I'm Ellisss. It's been a whirlwind, and I'm afraid I'm already feeling the drain of it all.

message: I feel that. I haven't talked about myssself this much, and it' sss getting harder.
Or maybe I haven't found sssomeone that it'sss easssy to talk with just, yet.

dialogue.message: Yeah, thessse thingsss might not be for you. At leassst you tried it though.

message: That'sss not good. It'll be over soon.
Only two more chumsss to go and then we can all go home.

dialogue: The ssstarsss aligned with the current weather pattern and time, made it ssseem like I wasss going to find my sssoulmate tonight.

dialogue.message: There'sss ssstill time! Don't give up.
You ssshouldn' blame yourssself. Try tarot reading next time, might help.
That ssstuff is a load of balony anywaysss.

dialogue: [announcer][buzzer]Okay Sssnakesss! Move to Sssnake Number five!!

dialogue.message: Ssshoot, thessse roundsss can be fassst. Talk to you later if you want.

dialogue: It's been cool chatting. Ssseee ya, either here or maybe we'll bump into each other at the library.
epilogue: Hey, [name]. Ssso, I thought you were kinda cool. You want to get sssome coffee or sssomething tomorrow?
Sssorry if that's lame or sssomething. But I think I sssee sssomething ssspecial in our future.
[player]That sssoundsss good, Ellisss. Our horossscopesss are well aligned.
[player]I'd love a cortado and a moussse bissscuit.
